definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-

sentences.english: Nay. It was the climax of the lapidary 's skill.
sentences.chinese: 这是宝石匠技术高超的表演。

sentences.english: Works with the full foot jade expected, the performance superb artistry.
sentences.chinese: 作品充分用足玉料，表现高超技艺。

sentences.english: George is expert atin flying a plane.
sentences.chinese: 乔治驾驶飞机的技术高超。

sentences.english: There were never more highly skilled workmen than those who lived in ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 在古代中国有着众多的手艺高超的能工巧匠。

sentences.english: It must be very difficult for them to be trained as very skillful acrobats .
sentences.chinese: 练习出技巧高超的杂技演员肯定很难。

sentences.english: His judgment, which was almost wholly disassociated from hope, held itself aloof and soared on high.
sentences.chinese: 他的判断，几乎摆脱了希望，是高超出众的。

sentences.english: All of the competing race bike dseas are not Very abundance skilled.
sentences.chinese: 所有竞争的赛车选手都有高超的技能。

sentences.english: Voldemort is also an accomplished Legilimens.
sentences.chinese: 伏地魔也是一个高超的摄神取念者。

sentences.english: The sculpture of a group of heroes in the centre of the city square shows a master hand.
sentences.chinese: 市中心广场的英雄群像的雕塑显示了高超的艺术。

sentences.english: The highly skillful one could turn round and round continuously with a multi-sided drum in hand.
sentences.chinese: 技艺高超者，手持多面鼓作各种姿态的连续旋转。

sentences.english: I go out of my way to patronize a dentist who has excellent communication skills.
sentences.chinese: 我经常光顾我的牙医，他有着高超的交流技巧。

sentences.english: These 8-year-old children will be trained as very skillful acrobats.
sentences.chinese: 这些8岁孩子将被训练成技艺高超的杂技演员。

sentences.english: She showed great skill in winning the hearts of the students.
sentences.chinese: 她在赢得学生欢心方面展露出高超的技巧。
双方都施展出高超的球艺。

sentences.english: He became famous for his great strength and great skill in cutting trees.
sentences.chinese: 他凭借伐树时强大的力量和高超的技艺变得出名。

sentences.english: I will imagine the emperor's craftsmen must be very skillful.
sentences.chinese: 我能想象皇帝聘请的这些工匠都技艺高超。

definition: to reach perfection (idiom); a superb artistic achievement
Gaoming district of Foshan city 佛山市[Fo2 shan1 shi4], Guangdong
lit. the stove fire has turned bright green (allusion to Daoist alchemy) (idiom)/fig. (of an art, a technique etc) brought to the point of perfection
training in the basic skills/knowledge of the fundamentals
to reach great heights (in technical skills or scholastic achievements)
